title: Don't worry about replying!~Suggest a joke accompaniment to sentence~
original_prompt: My girlfriend contacted me asking what my plans are for tomorrow. Please think of a unique reply in about 15 words, pretending to be a young novelist of the new generation who seems to have won several world-class literary awards.
input1: Tomorrow, I shall weave words into a tapestry of dreams, perhaps at the café.
input2: I plan to explore the labyrinth of my imagination, penning tales that dance with stars.
input1_ans: Tomorrow, I’ll be crafting prose in a cozy café, where inspiration dances with coffee steam.
Ah, the café beckons with its aromatic whispers; I shall craft stories amidst the clinking cups.
input2_ans: Tomorrow, I’ll weave words into worlds, crafting stories that shimmer like constellations in the night.
Ah, my dear, tomorrow I shall wander through the corridors of my mind, crafting stories that twinkle like distant constellations.
